oppHits.title: Community AI Workforce Development Grant
oppHits.agencyName: Department of Health and Human Services
oppHits.synopsis: Grant program for AI workforce development and data governance training in underserved communities. Machine learning, workflow automation, and decision support systems.

oppHits.title: Energy Grid Cybersecurity Monitoring Platform
oppHits.synopsis: Development of cybersecurity monitoring and analytics platform for energy infrastructure. Requires cloud computing, data pipeline development, and real-time anomaly detection.

oppHits.title: Non-profit only: Academic Research Data Infrastructure
oppHits.synopsis: Non-profit only research data infrastructure. University only eligible. R1 institution required for this academic computing grant.
